system.controller

Class WidgetController

  • java.lang.Object
    • system.model.LVSObject
      • system.controller.WidgetController

  • public class WidgetController
extends LVSObject
    This class is the controller which control all the default widget inculding add, delete and enable. The class suppose to use vtkWidgetSet however the library crush base on casting issue after update other vtk component like readers. Therefore, list was use for now since there is not observable advantage from using vtkWidgetSet for just to store all the widget. This controller can be further implement to modularize different VTK Widget.
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    Andy Tsang
